body:
The most reparative words were said to her by a medical magazine in February 2025:


[font="res://Assets/Font/InterItalic.ttf"]Emotional neglect occurs when caregivers fail to provide the emotional support, validation, and attention children need during their formative years.[/font]


She has been coming back to it since then. A healing incantation. Do you know why She finds it so powerful?

choices.label: 1) I have been emotionally tortured in my own childhood. She has no idea.
2) I really can't take any more accusations.
